titles.title: For the relief of Rabon Lowry.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Claims.

bill.summary: 2/25/1999--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual for damages he incurred as a result of the breach of a certain Government contract by the Department of the Army.
